text: Garrett "Rocky" Burnett (September 23, 1975 — April 11, 2022) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played with the Mighty Ducks of Anaheim of the National Hockey League in the 2003–04 season. Burnett died on April 11, 2022 at the age of 46. After his death, an autopsy revealed that Burnett had been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mighty Ducks of Anaheim players Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Ice hockey people from British Columbia
title: Garrett Burnett
